line_1: His flocks and herds engross'd the wide champain.
line_2: Of purchas'd slaves he led an endless train,

line_1: Should be assign'd on Goshen's rich champain
line_2: His father's num'rous charge to entertain.

line_1: Converts dull port to bright champain;
line_2: 'Tis here with boundless power I reign,

line_1: Spreads o'er the steepy slope or wide champain.
line_2: Where on neat ridges waves the golden grain;
